title: "We thank you for your time on this survey" Wait, what survey?
body: I just got a popup after my most recent league game. "Please give feedback to help us improve" or something similar. So i clicked the little box, it opened the web browser and the web browser simply states the title. What survey? What did you just claim that i've agreed to?

replies.body: Sometimes our devs or researches will send out surveys via email, but you can also get a small survey after a game.  That usually doesn't open up a browser, though.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this with you and see what happened.  Thanks for the heads up!
